page.title: 03MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: On a school day I get out of bed at 7 o'clock and have my breakfast with my mum, my dad and my brother. Then I go upstairs and brush my teeth, make my bed, brush my hair and go downstairs again to pack my bag and get on my bike to go to school. When I get to school it is usually a bit early so I play with my friends until it is 9 o'clock and then we all go in. First we have registration and then we sit down and start our work. At 10.30 we go out to play for 15 minutes. After that we work until 12 o'clock when we have lunch and play until 1.15. We go home at 3.15.
